# The `LinkContext` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Keeps track of data associated with one object during linking. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Keeps track of data associated with one object during linking.

i.e. source file descriptor, compilation units, output data for compilation units common tables.

Definition at line 161 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dwarflinkerimpl-h">DWARFLinkerImpl.h</a>.

  prototype={<>Error DWARFLinkerImpl::LinkContext::loadClangModule (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/dwarflinkerbase/#abdf3094623b3752dabeeb5bd7ceb24ad">ObjFileLoaderTy</a> Loader, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdie">DWARFDie</a> &amp; CUDie, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> std::string &amp; PCMFile, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/dwarflinkerbase/#a537122974e714f93e8ad5fa29439e856">CompileUnitHandlerTy</a> OnCUDieLoaded, unsigned Indent=0)</>}>
Recursively add the debug info in this clang module .pcm file (and all the modules imported by it in a bottom-up fashion) to ModuleUnits.

### registerModuleReference() {#a1cd88157223b53c481e0e884c7e01933}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool DWARFLinkerImpl::LinkContext::registerModuleReference (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfdie">DWARFDie</a> &amp; CUDie, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/dwarflinkerbase/#abdf3094623b3752dabeeb5bd7ceb24ad">ObjFileLoaderTy</a> Loader, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarf-linker/dwarflinkerbase/#a537122974e714f93e8ad5fa29439e856">CompileUnitHandlerTy</a> OnCUDieLoaded, unsigned Indent=0)</>}>
If this compile unit is really a skeleton <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a> that points to a clang module, register it in ClangModules and return true.

A skeleton <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a> is a <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/cu">CU</a> without children, a DW&#95;AT&#95;gnu&#95;dwo&#95;name pointing to the module, and a DW&#95;AT&#95;gnu&#95;dwo&#95;id with the module hash.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dwarflinkerimpl-h/#l00222">222</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dwarflinkerimpl-h">DWARFLinkerImpl.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dwarflinkerimpl-cpp/#l00343">343</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/dwarflinker/lib/dwarflinker/parallel/dwarflinkerimpl-cpp">DWARFLinkerImpl.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### HasNewInterconnectedCUs {#abaf7494cb3e5c41c67dc7086c909e4e8}

It is used for restarting units processing if new inter-connected units were found.
